SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.controller

Class HouseholdController

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.controller.HouseholdController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/households") public class HouseholdController extends Object
REST controller for managing household-related operations. Provides endpoints for creating households, handling join requests, and managing household memberships.

      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content
